adjective.description: Serving as a means of pursuing an aim or policy.
examples: the Society was instrumental in bringing about legislation

adjective.description: (of music) performed on instruments, with no vocals.
Relating to an implement or measuring device.
Denoting or relating to a case of nouns and pronouns (and words in grammatical agreement with them) indicating a means or instrument.

noun.description: A piece of (usually nonclassical) music performed by instruments, with no vocals.
